message.content:
Research the backend Gradle build configuration in /Users/se/git/cc-experiments. Answer these questions:
1. What JDK version is required (check gradle/wrapper/gradle-wrapper.properties or build.gradle.kts)?
2. What Gradle version is used?
3. What is the exact Gradle module structure (settings.gradle.kts)?
4. What test tasks exist in the backend module (any test configurations, Testcontainers setup)?
5. What does the backend/build.gradle.kts look like (Spring Boot version, dependencies)?
6. What does shared-dto/build.gradle.kts look like?
7. Are there any existing .github/ directories or CI files?
Read the relevant files and provide exact contents of: settings.gradle.kts, build.gradle.kts (root), backend/build.gradle.kts, shared-dto/build.gradle.kts, gradle/wrapper/gradle-wrapper.properties. Also check for .github directory.

content.text: I'll read all the relevant files in parallel to give you a comprehensive answer.

content.text:
Here is the complete picture of the backend Gradle build configuration.

---

## 1. JDK Version

**Java 21** is required.

Defined in `/Users/se/git/cc-experiments/gradle/libs.versions.toml` at line 2:
```toml
javaVersion = "21"
```

Applied via a Java toolchain in `/Users/se/git/cc-experiments/backend/build.gradle.kts` lines 11-20:
```kotlin
java {
    toolchain {
        languageVersion =
            JavaLanguageVersion.of(
                libs.versions.javaVersion
                    .get()
                    .toInt(),
            )
    }
}
```

---

## 2. Gradle Version

**Gradle 9.3.1**

From `/Users/se/git/cc-experiments/gradle/wrapper/gradle-wrapper.properties`:
```properties
distributionUrl=https\://services.gradle.org/distributions/gradle-9.3.1-bin.zip
```

---

## 3. Module Structure

From `/Users/se/git/cc-experiments/settings.gradle.kts`:
```kotlin
rootProject.name = "book-leaderboard"
include("shared-dto", "backend")
```

Two submodules:
- `:shared-dto` — shared data transfer objects with kotlinx.serialization
- `:backend` — Spring Boot application

---

## 4. Test Tasks in Backend

From `/Users/se/git/cc-experiments/backend/build.gradle.kts` lines 49-57:

**Test dependencies:**
```kotlin
testImplementation("org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-starter-test")
testImplementation("org.testcontainers:junit-jupiter")
testImplementation("org.testcontainers:postgresql")
testImplementation("org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-testcontainers")
```

**Test task configuration:**
```kotlin
tasks.withType<Test> {
    useJUnitPlatform()
}
```

Testcontainers is configured with:
- `org.testcontainers:junit-jupiter` — JUnit 5 integration (`@Testcontainers`, `@Container`)
- `org.testcontainers:postgresql` — PostgreSQL container
- `org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-testcontainers` — Spring Boot's native Testcontainers support (`@ServiceConnection`)

There is only one standard test task (the default `test` task). No custom test tasks or test source sets are defined.

---

## 5. backend/build.gradle.kts (Full Contents)

`/Users/se/git/cc-experiments/backend/build.gradle.kts`:
```kotlin
plugins {
    alias(libs.plugins.kotlin.jvm)
    alias(libs.plugins.kotlin.plugin.spring)
    alias(libs.plugins.kotlin.plugin.jpa)
    alias(libs.plugins.spring.boot)
    alias(libs.plugins.spring.dependency.management)
}

group = "com.bookreads"

java {
    toolchain {
        languageVersion =
            JavaLanguageVersion.of(
                libs.versions.javaVersion
                    .get()
                    .toInt(),
            )
    }
}

kotlin {
    compilerOptions {
        freeCompilerArgs.addAll("-Xjsr305=strict")
    }
}

repositories {
    mavenCentral()
}

dependencies {
    implementation(project(":shared-dto"))

    implementation("org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-starter-web")
    implementation("org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-starter-websocket")
    implementation("org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-starter-data-jpa")
    implementation("org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-starter-validation")
    implementation("org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-starter-security")

    implementation("org.flywaydb:flyway-core")
    implementation("org.flywaydb:flyway-database-postgresql")

    runtimeOnly("org.postgresql:postgresql")

    implementation("com.fasterxml.jackson.module:jackson-module-kotlin")
    implementation("org.jetbrains.kotlin:kotlin-reflect")

    testImplementation("org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-starter-test")
    testImplementation("org.testcontainers:junit-jupiter")
    testImplementation("org.testcontainers:postgresql")
    testImplementation("org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-testcontainers")
}

tasks.withType<Test> {
    useJUnitPlatform()
}
```

**Spring Boot version: 3.3.5** (from `libs.versions.toml` line 6: `spring-boot = "3.3.5"`).

Key dependencies:
- Web, WebSocket, Data JPA, Validation, Security starters
- Flyway with PostgreSQL dialect
- PostgreSQL JDBC driver (runtime)
- Jackson Kotlin module + kotlin-reflect
- Kotlin 2.1.0 with `-Xjsr305=strict`

---

## 6. shared-dto/build.gradle.kts (Full Contents)

`/Users/se/git/cc-experiments/shared-dto/build.gradle.kts`:
```kotlin
plugins {
    alias(libs.plugins.kotlin.jvm)
    alias(libs.plugins.kotlin.plugin.serialization)
}

group = "com.bookreads"

repositories {
    mavenCentral()
}

dependencies {
    implementation(libs.kotlinx.serialization.json)
}
```

Single dependency: `org.jetbrains.kotlinx:kotlinx-serialization-json:1.7.3`.

---

## 7. .github Directory

No `.github` directory exists. The Glob search returned no results. There are no CI/CD workflow files in this repository.

---

## Summary Table

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| JDK | 21 (toolchain) |
| Gradle | 9.3.1 |
| Kotlin | 2.1.0 |
| Spring Boot | 3.3.5 |
| kotlinx.serialization | 1.7.3 |
| Root project name | `book-leaderboard` |
| Modules | `:shared-dto`, `:backend` |
| Test framework | JUnit Platform (JUnit 5) |
| Testcontainers | postgresql + junit-jupiter + spring-boot-testcontainers |
| CI files | None (.github does not exist) |
